r2dii.banks

r2dii.banks is a collection of R packages that 2DII developed for banks.

Install r2dii.banks with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("2DegreesInvesting/r2dii.banks")

Then load it with:

library(r2dii.banks)
#> Loading required package: r2dii.analysis
#> Loading required package: r2dii.data
#> Loading required package: r2dii.match
  • Did you get installation errors? First upgrade R, RStudio, and R packages and retry.
  • Do you still need help? First learn how to make a reprex then share it with us.
  • Do you want to explore functions and datasets? Search our reference.
